project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file to count frequency of each word and displays top 10 most common words.

task.name: Implement the feature to read a text file
Count the frequency of each word in the text file
Identify the top 10 most common words
Display the top 10 most common words in the terminal
Write tests for the functionality including file reading and word counting
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure correctness
